hero.title: Chronic Disease Care Assistant
hero.subtitle: LLM-powered consultation platform delivering professional guidance for chronic conditions

chat.title: Intelligent Dialogue
chat.description: LLM-based real-time consultations tailored to chronic disease scenarios

plan.title: Personalized Plans
plan.description: Generate treatment suggestions aligned with patient history and symptoms

analysis.title: Data Insights
analysis.description: Holistic data analytics that surface actionable wellness advice

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: Enterprise-grade encryption and access control for sensitive data

service.title: Always Online
service.description: 24/7 availability so patients can reach help whenever they need

reliable.title: Clinically Informed
reliable.description: Grounded in reputable medical knowledge bases to ensure reliability

about.title: About
about.heading: A Dedicated Platform for Chronic Care
about.description1: We blend cutting-edge language models with traditional Chinese medicine aesthetics to create an engaging consultation experience.
about.description2: The interface keeps the warm yellow palette of classical medicine while delivering modern usability and clarity.

chat.patientProfileHint: Completing the profile helps the model respond more precisely
chat.allergiesPlaceholder: List any drug or food allergies (optional)
chat.questionPlaceholder: Ask your question here — more detail brings better answers
chat.infoSaved: Profile updated. The next message will include refreshed details.
chat.conversationDisabledDetail: The model settings have been changed by an administrator. This conversation can no longer be used. Please create a new conversation to continue.
chat.modelUpdatedNotice: The system model has been updated. This conversation is now disabled. Please create a new conversation to continue.
chat.welcomeTitle: Welcome to the Chronic Disease Care Assistant
chat.welcomeSubtitle: Create a new session and complete your profile to start consulting.
chat.ageError: Please enter an integer between 0 and 120

conversations.description: Inspect and moderate every conversation on the platform

register.title: Create account
register.passwordRule: Password must be at least 6 characters

about.title: About
about.intro: An LLM-powered consultation companion for chronic condition management
about.systemIntro: We combine modern AI with trusted medical references to deliver meaningful care recommendations.

featureList.chat: LLM-driven conversations tailored to chronic care needs

featureList.admin: Comprehensive admin toolbox for platform governance

about.disclaimer: The information provided is for educational purposes only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice.
